components.description: A round military helmet with a chinstrap. All platforms depict a green helmet, with some designs featuring a green camouflage pattern.
components.title: Military Helmet

version.description:
Unicode 13.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on March 10, 2020. 55 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 117 new emojis for 2020 (including sequences for gender and skin tone) listed under Emoji 13.0.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's military helmet emoji is depicted with sturdy, practical detailing, featuring a matte olive-drab finish and realistic shadows that convey its protective nature. The soft rounded edges ensure it fits seamlessly with other Apple icons, while the subtle highlights suggest a well-worn but reliable piece of equipment. This emoji symbolizes defense, security, service, and the armed forces, often used in contexts related to military matters or a strong sense of protection.
